urls.title: Job Board URLs
urls.description: One or more Greenhouse job board URLs to scrape.

departments.title: Department IDs (optional)
departments.description: Filter jobs by department. Find IDs by clicking a department filter on the job board and copying the number from the URL (e.g., ?departments[]=59798).

maxJobs.title: Max Jobs Per Board
maxJobs.description: Limit the number of jobs scraped from each board (optional).

daysBack.title: Recent Jobs Only (days)
daysBack.description: Only scrape jobs updated in the last N days. Useful for scheduled runs to fetch recent postings only.
